title: True Sight

event.title: Global Game Jam
event.theme: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are

how_to_play: Move with arrow keys or WASD
After finding the shades, you mustn't stop
Also, don't look at advertsings when they change (usually you have to look outside the screen, by pressing left)
There's no ending, it's about a score based game

description: Experimental thing about seeing... the truth... behind stuff... kinda...
The game is somewhat playable, but it's really unfinished. It was my first time taking part of a jam with a team and it didn't work out too well...
